ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define Balance Check Required Flag based on the characteristics of the payment such as Originating Source, Account Type,
Incoming Message Type and Clearing Nature Code.
If the flag is set to ‘Y’ then fund authorization is required for the payment. Else fund authorization is not required for the payment.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.BALANCECHECKREQUIRED
The entries in the table are searched for a match in the order of their ranking. The Balance Check Required flag is retrieved from the first entry
that matches the payment characteristics based on the peeling logic used in payments hub. If no entry meets the match criteria then a default value of ‘Y’ is considered.

desc.p: Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
3 alphanumeric characters. The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY

Specifies the order (sequence) of the record in the application. Based on the value, a record is prioritised in such a way that, it is given higher preference for selection under peeling logic applied in the payments hub.
Specifies the name of the source from where the payment is originated.
Specifies the type of account for which balance check is to be performed or skipped.
Holds the type of the incoming message type.
Holds the code used to identify the nature of the clearing payment.
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
Indicates if balance is to be checked by the payments hub for a payment of the defined characteristics.
A value of "Y" implies that the balance check is required for the payment.
A value of "N" implies that the balance check is not required for the payment.
Indicates whether the payment is a settlement transaction or not.
A value of 'Y' indicates the transaction is a settlement transaction.
Blank value indicates the transaction is not a settlement transaction.
Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
1 alphanumeric character. The value is not editable by the user.
